name_original: Reboot (itch) (Marinelli Julien, SebastienVS, MatteoCollu, Kyanos, Ky0kii, Rhezom)
description:
Reboot is an adventure game for one player with an alternate reality mechanism.

The main objective is to find the culprit and accuse him before the end of the fifth day.

This version is a prototype made in 5 weeks by a 6 members team.
Final version of the game would include many endings and more characters to interact with.

In a distant future, memories can be saved and re uploaded in another body after death for those who can afford it. 
You're travelling on a luxurious passenger ship but peace and tranquility vanished when dead bodies start to appear.
What's better than a little investigation to kill time?

You are Tacitus, a simuloid, a robot with a human mind. You are in the midst of a murder mystery and must uncover the criminal before it's too late.

ZQSD/WASD : move your avatar
Mouse : look around
Left click : interact with items/characters
Right click, m : open your PDA/cancel conversation
Esc : open Settings menu
